abilities.name: Heaven's Will
abilities.details: When Cyrus damages an enemy champion with his abilities, the target will be marked by the Heaven's Will, increasing the damage they take from Cyrus for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.details:
Cyrus launches a barrage of lumious bolts at a target location over a very short duration. Each bolt explodes upon landing, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit.

The bolts can be blocked by an enemy hero before they reach the target location, and the damage will be dealt to only that target. Casting this ability does not interupt with Cyrus's movement.

abilities.name: Dominion
abilities.details:
Cyrus designates a target area, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and slightly slowing them.

After a few seconds, the area erupts with cosmic energy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies within and stunning them.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.details:
Cyrus launches a slow-moving, expanding orb of cosmic energy in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies it passes through.

If Singularity passes through an active Dominion zone, the zone immediately erupts with cosmic energy (secondary effect of that ability).

If Retribution passes through the moving Singularity, each bolt will deal bonus magical damage (scaling with magical power).

abilities.name: Judgement
abilities.details:
Cyrus unleashes a radiant blast on all enemies marked by the Heaven's Will, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to each target.

If the target's health is below a certain threshold, Judgement will execute the target. Enemies are also briefly revealed from the start of the cast time.
